content: twisted ribbing and horseshoe cables add extra dimension to this super-soft knit hat pattern has you practicing cables and knitting in the round as you stitch in your favorite self-striping shade of caron latte cakes it s a luxurious hat with a relaxed fit making it a must-have accessory for your cold weather wardrobe note 1 ball of caron latte cakes will make 2 hats english download on website french and english inside yarn label materials set of 4 sizes u s 10 6 mm and u s 10½ 6 5 mm double-pointed knitting needles or size needed to obtain gauge cable needle stitch marker
